Option Name: Front Wall Is Adiabatic: Whether the front wall of the dwelling unit is adiabatic.
Back Wall Is Adiabatic: Whether the back wall of the dwelling unit is adiabatic.
Left Wall Is Adiabatic: Whether the left wall of the dwelling unit is adiabatic.
Right Wall Is Adiabatic: Whether the right wall of the dwelling unit is adiabatic.
